name: Accumulated negative changes derivation rule
description: This derivation rule aims to obtain the Accumulated negative changes from its building blocks.
algorithm:
SET ACCMLTD_CHNG_NGTV =
        CASE
            WHEN TYP_ABSTRCT_INSTRMNT_RL = 71
                AND TKN_PSSSSN_DT > DATEADD(month,-3,DT_RFRNC) 
                AND TKN_PSSSSN_DT < DT_RFRNC
                AND INTL_RCGNTN_VL - CRRYNG_AMNT < 0 
                    THEN INTL_RCGNTN_VL - CRRYNG_AMNT
            ELSE 'N/A'
        END;

logical_transformation_rule.algorithm:
SET BIRD_INSTRMNT_RL_EIL.ACCMLTD_CHNG_NGTV =
        CASE
            WHEN BIRD_INSTRMNT_RL_IL.TYP_ABSTRCT_INSTRMNT_RL = 71
                AND BIRD_CLLTRL_IL.TKN_PSSSSN_DT > DATEADD(month,-3,BIRD_CLLTRL_IL.DT_RFRNC) 
                AND BIRD_CLLTRL_IL.TKN_PSSSSN_DT < BIRD_CLLTRL_IL.DT_RFRNC
                AND BIRD_CLLTRL_IL.INTL_RCGNTN_VL - BIRD_CLLTRL_IL.CRRYNG_AMNT < 0 
                    THEN BIRD_CLLTRL_IL.INTL_RCGNTN_VL - BIRD_CLLTRL_IL.CRRYNG_AMNT
            ELSE 'N/A'
        END;

SET BIRD_CLLTRL_EIL.ACCMLTD_CHNG_NGTV =
        CASE
            WHEN BIRD_INSTRMNT_RL_IL.TYP_ABSTRCT_INSTRMNT_RL = 71
                AND BIRD_CLLTRL_IL.TKN_PSSSSN_DT > DATEADD(month,-3,BIRD_CLLTRL_IL.DT_RFRNC) 
                AND BIRD_CLLTRL_IL.TKN_PSSSSN_DT < BIRD_CLLTRL_IL.DT_RFRNC
                AND BIRD_CLLTRL_IL.INTL_RCGNTN_VL - BIRD_CLLTRL_IL.CRRYNG_AMNT < 0 
                    THEN BIRD_CLLTRL_IL.INTL_RCGNTN_VL - BIRD_CLLTRL_IL.CRRYNG_AMNT
            ELSE 'N/A'
        END;
